cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 425 miles south of Cameron, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across the central Gulf, expected to turn north-northeast and track toward southwest and south-central Louisiana
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Cameron, Louisiana (just west of Vermilion Bay)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch from High Island TX to Sabine Pass
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning east of Sabine Pass to Morgan City LA; Storm Surge Warning Sabine Pass to Ocean Springs MS including Calcasieu Lake
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southwest and south-central Louisiana coast (High Island TX eastward to Morgan City LA)
weather_observation.wind: Hurricane-force winds (74–110 mph) expected Friday afternoon into Friday night at the port.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 2–4 ft of surge possible in Calcasieu Lake, locally higher east of the port.
weather_observation.rainfall: 5–10 inches with isolated totals up to 15 inches Friday–Saturday, causing flash and urban flooding.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated tornadoes Friday; dangerous surf and rip currents beginning Thursday night.
